citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on 12
January 2023.
Family was leaving for an appointment as I drove up. They would not be available for the entire day.
End Section
